question: Mangesh Tendulkar, the renowned cartoonist has passed away. He hailed from which state?
explanation: Mangesh Tendulkar (82), the renowned cartoonist, has passed away in Pune, Maharashtra. His cartoons especially about government offices and on traffic rules were famous.  He often used satire in his cartoons to give social messages and even called himself a satirist (vyang chitrakar). He was conferred with the presidentâ€™s medal in 1980, Marathi Natya Parishad Award in 1993 and Pulotsav award in 2003 among several other honours.
